title: 2016 Ford Mustang arrives at Bell Ford with new technology and familiar performance
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/24/2015 @ 5:31 AM   Bell Ford 
PHOENIX, Sept. 24, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- One of the most highly anticipated vehicles of the year has finally arrived on the lot at Bell Ford, a Ford dealership in Phoenix, Arizona. The 2016 Ford Mustang is looking to continue the record-breaking success of the 2015 model by adding several new, driver-friendly technologies. Of course, the famous sports car also returns the performance and style that has long been tradition in a Ford Mustang. Bell Ford has summarized all of the latest changes to the 2016 Ford Mustang with its latest model information page . 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150923/270152 
One feature that many drivers have been looking forward to utilizing on the new 2016 Ford Mustang is the Track Apps function, which now comes standard on all models. Track Apps utilizes a 4.2-inch display screen message center to inform the driver about his or her latest performance metrics. It can relay information such as latitude and longitudinal g-forces, acceleration times, lap times and brake performance to the driver almost instantaneously. 
The Track Apps feature isn't the only new technology that Mustang enthusiasts have been excited for. The 2016 Ford Mustang also marks the arrival of the SYNC 3 Connectivity system to the famous muscle car. SYNC 3 is a faster, more responsive system than the original SYNC system, and now offers more advanced voice-recognition capabilities. 
Once again the Mustang will be offered in both a fastback and convertible option. The legendary GT trim will also be available, which comes equipped with the massive 5.0-liter V8 engine that produces 435-horsepower and 400 pound-feet of torque. Other engine options for the 2016 Mustang include the standard 3.7-liter V6 and the 2.3-liter EcoBoost Turbo. 
Several 2016 Ford Mustang models are now for sale on the Bell Ford lot. Drivers interested in learning more information about the 2016 Mustang should contact a Bell Ford sales professional by calling 855-975-6958 or visiting the dealership's website, www.bellford.com .
